title: Day3, In His Sleep, Age Limit, Famous Last Words and more.
itunes:title: Day3, In His Sleep, Age Limit, Famous Last Words and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Day3 needs you and we start off with Bank Talk. We have The Uplift Guarantee just for you. What Steve said to the ladies on the show was not very nice. The fellas have the things last said before never being heard from again. Money never changed him! Ever not had toilet paper but had napkins from all our favorite fast food joints? Whoever said sleeping on the job will get you nowhere is full of Sugar Honey Iced Tea! We get it from the other LA all the way to Macon, GA. Thank you. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve explains the relationship between the shining stars and darkness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
